alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued February 01 at 3:09PM EST until February 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 15 to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Northwestern Connecticut and the Mid Hudson Valley and southern Taconics in east central New York. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will fall behind a front late Thursday night into Friday morning. The lowest wind chills are expected Friday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess
